content.text:
Follow these steps directly until I say stop (do not ask):

1. Locate the two play modes; choose the one that starts with “Man…” to pick each round yourself.  
2. In the rectangular box showing “0.00000000,” enter the amount you intend to bet.  
3. Below, in the smaller field marked “2.00x,” set your desired multiplier for auto-exit.  
4. Find the large bright button starting with “B…” directly below and click it to initiate.  
5. Observe the increasing values such as “1.07x” or “4.3x” in the middle portion of the screen.  
6. To cash out manually, click the small button confirming manual exit.  
7. If the value surpasses your set multiplier, your winnings will be automatically secured.  
8. Review each result displayed beneath the colored values, then repeat if you wish to continue playing.

I apologize, but I don't see any interface or game that matches those instructions in the available tools and display. It seems like you're referring to some kind of online betting or gambling game, but I don't currently have access to or see this interface in the virtual environment.

Let me know what specific website or application you'd like me to navigate to first, and I'll help guide you through the steps once we have the correct interface loaded.
